channel.title: Win. Server 2003 (Opinions/discuss)
channel.description: Well, I might get back into RSPS's so I decided to put it onto my old laptop. It looks clean and all. How do you feel about the OS?

item.title: Win. Server 2003 (Opinions/discuss)
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:12, topic:345817”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=442198.msg3247788#msg3247788 date=1277505972]
Gay, go get CentOS and install that. DO NOT download a graphical interface, so all your memory can be reserved for hosting your server, good luck if you decide to follow up on this.
[/quote]
I am not very good with command-line OS’s yet. EX: Arch Linux, I can log in, and that’s about it. I’m not too sure why i can’t get used to it. Its just how I am.[/quote]There’s really only like 3 commands you need to know.
apt-get (package name) - this would be used to install java
wget www.DOWNLOADMYSOURCE.com - this to transfer your source from your current computer to the CENTOS.
Java -Xmx(memoryAMT)m server

and that’s pretty much it.

Read full topic

item.title: Win. Server 2003 (Opinions/discuss)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Java Is My Bitch:

Gay, go get CentOS and install that. DO NOT download a graphical interface, so all your memory can be reserved for hosting your server, good luck if you decide to follow up on this.

I am not very good with command-line OS’s yet. EX: Arch Linux, I can log in, and that’s about it. I’m not too sure why i can’t get used to it. Its just how I am.

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:10, topic:345817”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=442198.msg3247719#msg3247719 date=1277502379]

Change the CPU, Motherboard, Ram and HDD then your set.

I would, if it was possible. They no-longer make parts (to my knowledge) for this computer. Thats why I got a new one

Just so you know:

What I’ll be using as a server, is just for temp. I will get a VPS later.

[/quote]So i’ll get free admin and st00f pl0x?
Na joking; well if its temp then its ok, PLEASE download an proper base no delta :)[/quote]
Umm, I plan on working from a blank one, that has basic stuff done. Probably a IClarity base, or something along those lines.

Read full topic

item.title: Win. Server 2003 (Opinions/discuss)
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:6, topic:345817”]I would use XP, but Server has alot of the every-day use features removed, so that it can run cleaner. Or at least this is what i herd.

TIP - This is a old laptop that uses DDR ram.[/quote]

If its that old I wouldn’t, save up for a newer laptop that you know could handle running a server. Add the laptop specs. <3

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:3, topic:345817”]Server 2003 isn’t really for RSPS is it? More like businesses and stores IMO. But I never used it, always been an XP fan. Disable the barbie looks on it and it’s the best OS ever I use 64bit, my server hosts fine with it.[/quote]Ye 64bit + 4gb ram = pro
